articles.title: Fossil of 'skunk' that lived among dinosaurs unearthed in Patagonia - The Straits Times
articles.description: SANTIAGO • A fossil of a skunk-like mammal that lived during the age of dinosaurs has been discovered in Chilean Patagonia, adding further proof to recent evidence that mammals roamed that part of South America a lot earlier than previously thought.. Read mor…

articles.title: White House COVID-19 response team to hold briefing as vaccinations surge - KTVH
articles.description: The White House COVID-19 response team will hold a regularly-scheduled briefing Friday as the Biden administration races to vaccinate as many Americans as possible while variant strains of the virus continue to spreads.

articles.content:
A trio of Russian and American space travellers have launched successfully and reached the International Space Station.
